          loads color names to RGB mapping from file The format is color_name=r=xxx,g=xxx,b=xxx where 0 <= xxx <= 255 If the properties could not be loaded default color names and mappings are created.

parseOrientationProperty

public static final int parseOrientationProperty(java.lang.String property)
parses string to get orientation

Returns:
the orientation as GEAttr.VERTICAL | .HORIZONTAL

loadColorProperties

public final void loadColorProperties(java.lang.String filename)
loads color names to RGB mapping from file The format is color_name=r=xxx,g=xxx,b=xxx where 0 <= xxx <= 255 If the properties could not be loaded default color names and mappings are created.

parseColorProperty

public static final java.awt.Color parseColorProperty(java.lang.String colorProperty)
parses string to get color. The string either contains the Color default toString representation or the name of the color as defined in the rgb.properties file.

parseDimensionProperty

public static final java.awt.Dimension parseDimensionProperty(java.lang.String dimensionProperty)
parses string to get dimension from the default toString() of Dimension

returns all elements of the class cl in the given container This does a deep search into the heirarchy of the container

isJDK2

public static boolean isJDK2()
returns true if JVM is jdk2 or more.

drawThickLine

public static final void drawThickLine(java.awt.Graphics g,
                                       int x1,
                                       int y1,
                                       int x2,
                                       int y2,
                                       double t)
Simulates drawing of different thickness lines by using filled polygon.

Parameters:
g - Graphics on which to draw
x1 - The starting x co-ordinate of line
y1 - The starting y co-ordinate of line
x2 - The ending x co-ordinate of line
y2 - The ending y co-ordinate of line
t - The thickness of the line in pixels
